   20: 
   21: -module(ct_data_dir_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   24: -compile(export_all).
   25: 
   26: -include("ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: -define(data_dir_name, atom_to_list(?MODULE)++"_data").
   29: 
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{timetrap, {seconds,1}},
   32:      {ct_hooks, [verify_data_dir_cth]}].
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [test_case_1, {group,test_group}].
   36: 
   37: groups() ->
   38:     [{test_group,[],[test_case_2]}].
   39: 
   40: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   41:     check_dirs(Config),
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   45:     check_dirs(Config),
   46:     ok.
   47: 
   48: test_case_1(Config) ->
   49:     check_dirs(Config),
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: test_case_2(Config) ->
   53:     check_dirs(Config),
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: check_dirs(Config) ->
   57:     %% check priv_dir
   58:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   59:     "log_private" = filename:basename(PrivDir),
   60:     {ok,_} = file:list_dir(PrivDir),
   61:     
   62:     %% check data_dir
   63:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   64:     DataDirName = ?data_dir_name,
   65:     DataDirName = filename:basename(DataDir),
   66:     ok.
   67:     
   68:
